prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Pavol develops WebGPT, a web page generation service. He has also created Collboard, the first Czech virtual whiteboard, and H-edu, electronic textbooks used by tens of thousands of children.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: WebGPT, web page generation, Collboard, virtual whiteboard, H-edu, electronic textbooks
